introduction.title: Scroll Down Automatic Youtube Shorts
introduction.subtitle: This extension allows YouTube Shorts to automatically scroll down.

use.title: How to use
use.text-1: A switch and option button are created at the top of the video.
use.text-2: Automatic playback starts when the switch is turned on.
use.text-3: Autoplay is canceled when the switch is turned off.

errorResponse.title: Error Actions
errorResponse.text-1: When accessing Youtube ➡ Short, you need to refresh (F5) once to use it.
errorResponse.text-2: If an error occurs, refresh the page (F5) to use it normally.

explanation.title: Donation
explanation.text-1: If you press ⭐, it will be a great help. thank you
